\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{M^n \oplus M^{n-1}} \&\& {M^{n+1} \oplus M^{n}} \&\& {M^{n+2} \oplus M^{n+1}} \\
	{C^n} \&\& {C^{n+1}} \&\& {C^{n+2}}
	\arrow["{\binom {0 \ 0}{1 \ 0}}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{(f_n, d_C^{n-1}\circ f_{n-1})}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\binom {0 \ 0}{1 \ 0}}", from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{(f_{n+1}, d_C^{n}\circ f_{n})}"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{(f_{n+2}, d_C^{n+1}\circ f_{n+1})}"', from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{d_C^n}"', from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{d_C^{n+1}}"', from=2-3, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
